forth.comment: Native words qualified by wordlists as wid1::wid2::word
forth.def: SP@ >R EXECUTE xt ( -- x ) SP@ R> EQ -5010 THROW

def.name: (I-QNATIVE)
def.ds: a u wid1 -- xt true | false

forth.def: >R `:: SPLIT- R> SEARCH-WORDLIST R> SEARCH-WORDLIST 2DROP FALSE EXECUTE-BALANCED(+1)

def.name: I-QNATIVE
def.ds: c-addr u -- xt true | c-addr u false

forth.def: 2DUP `:: SPLIT- 2DROP FALSE I-NATIVE 2DROP 2DROP FALSE EXECUTE-BALANCED(+1) (I-QNATIVE) FALSE NIP NIP TRUE
